fr.gouv.vitam.tools.mailextract.lib.formattools.rtf

Class HTMLFromRTFExtractor

  • Object
    • fr.gouv.vitam.tools.mailextract.lib.formattools.rtf.HTMLFromRTFExtractor

  • public class HTMLFromRTFExtractor
extends Object
    The Class HTMLFromRTFextractor for desencapsulating text and html from rtf.

    This is strongly inspired by RTFParser in Tika 1.17 under http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0 Conform with MSDN directives to de-encapsulate HTML from RTF https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ee159984(v=exchg.80).aspx
